channel.title: Acheron "Ak-e-ron" Beta
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4295981/Untitled.png[/img]
[FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://www.acheron317.weebly.com"]Home[/URL] ~ [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/2edijzdhupndtf2/AcheronBeta.jar"]Play Acheron Beta[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER]
[ADMIN=What is Acheron?]Acheron is a 317 server loading 667. We have many features here at Acheron and today you get to enjoy them as many other players would. Here at Acheron we value our players the most then the server we actually listen to our players for any suggests , bugs , etc & problems through-out the world of Acheron. So come join us, check us out and see what you're missing out on. We're full of unique fun content and you may even make a friend or two.[/ADMIN]
[ADMIN=Why Choose Acheron?]Before delivering our content, we test and analyze it completely before releasing it to the public, this ensures that it is developed perfectly and correctly in order to be released to the players. A minimum of 2 hours of development is guaranteed from our developer every day.[/ADMIN]
[ADMIN=What is our goal?]Our goal is to bring YOU the best Runescape Private Server experience. As we are a non-profit server most of our money will come from Google Ad-sense to help the server stay alive. But donations are welcomed to those who want to give out a hand. Or want that Torva item they've been dreaming of. The choice is yours.[/ADMIN]
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4303067/Features.png[/img][/CENTER] [ADMIN=Features] [SIZE=4][CENTER]Full Summoning Full Duo Slayer 15+ Bosses 3 Slayer Masters Great Economy Money pouch Daily Updates Music System Dwarf Multi-cannon Loyalty Titles Full Clan Chats Gambling Tons of fun mini-games Customizable Client Active wilderness Flawless combat 23 working skills Targeting System Advance Drop System Glacors[/CENTER][/SIZE] [/ADMIN]
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4303071/Media.png[/img][/CENTER] [SPOILER=Some Image of the server] [CENTER][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4303076/Screenshot_6.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4303078/Screenshot_11.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4303082/Screenshot_8.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4303080/Screenshot_2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4303084/Screenshot_1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4303085/Screenshot_2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4303087/Screenshot_3.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4303089/Screenshot_5.png[/img][/CENTER] [/SPOILER]
[CENTER][FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://www.acheron317.weebly.com"]Home[/URL] ~ [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/2edijzdhupndtf2/AcheronBeta.jar"]Play Acheron Beta[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER]
